entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @realDonaldTrump Frump, you should focus more on testing cause you are a failure,unlike the New Zealand president that beat the coronavirus and now they got single digits and she a woman, that woman. https://t.co/pLsW6f0UA4
